bibl.title: Menander, Fragments 745 and 746 K-T, Menander's Kolax, and Parasites and Flatterers in Greek Comedy.
bibl.note: PLUTARCH, Moralia 547C; 547D-E. - I. Do fragments 745 and 746 come from Menander's Kolax? There is a case for assigning both fragments (however tentatively) to Kolax. - II. Parasites and Flatterers.
BROWN Peter G. McC., Menander, Fragments 745 and 746 K-T, Menander's Kolax, and Parasites and Flatterers in Greek Comedy.
364 Menander C Colax Menander C Fabula Incerta
